name: Infernal Escape
description:
A dog was exploring a cave and accidentally fell into a hellish world. Help him escape in this Zelda-inspired adventure!

This version features one level with a dungeon, 3 weapons and 2 gadgets. Solve puzzles, battle evil skeletons and defeat the menacing Skull.

Credits:

Made by Yakov Dav

Music by Pavel Dav

2D Art by Ksenia Teplukhina

Special thanks to Ivan Lebedev, Pavel Dav for the level design and SFX help.

Made with Unreal Engine 5

Additional assets credits are coming soon
